channel.title: Jmanage on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Jmanage on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Visualising OBIEE DMS Metrics over the years
item.description: It struck me today when I was writing my most recent blog over at Rittman Mead that I’ve been playing with visualising OBIEE metrics for years now. Back in 2009 I wrote about using something called JManage to pull metrics out of OBIEE 10g via JMX: Still with OBIEE 10g in 2011, I was using rrdtool and some horrible-looking tcl hacking to get the metrics out through jmx :
